author: Austin Evans

I went all-out building the most excessive gaming setup possible, from a $900 monitor running at 540Hz to a device that literally pumps game-scented air into my face. After testing everything from glass mousepads to butt-vibrating cushions, I discovered which premium peripherals actually improve your gaming experience and which ones just empty your wallet. Spoiler: that glass mousepad is buttery smooth!

Chapter Titles:
0:00 Graphics Card
0:51 Keyboard
2:04 Mouse
4:05 Mousepad
6:22 Headset
7:54 GameScent

title: The MOST Expensive Gaming Gear Experiment
